dialog.text: If you use the Title of Liberty in the battle against Amalickiah at Zarahemla, I am certain he won't get any more reinforcements and the people will be inspired to follow you instead.

Master, I have an idea of how to beat Amalickiah at Zarahemla. Men will rally behind you once again if you inspire them and remind them of what they are fighting for. Did you bring me a robe and spear?

dialog.text: Master, I have an idea of how to beat Amalickiah at Zarahemla. Men will rally behind you once again if you inspire them and remind them of what they are fighting for. Bring me a robe and a spear, and we should be able to make a banner you can write a message on.
